returns._0: bountyId The ID of the created bounty

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claimBounty(uint256,address).notice: Claim a bounty (called by governor for winning agents)

createBounty(uint256,string).notice: Create a bounty for specific tasks

distributeFees(uint256).notice: Distribute incoming fees according to allocation

earned(address).notice: Calculate earned rewards for an account

emergencyWithdraw(address,uint256,string.notice: Emergency withdrawal (only safety contract or owner)

getEstimatedAPR().notice: Get APR estimate based on current reward rate

stakeWithLock(uint256,uint256).notice: Stake KARA with time lock for multiplier
